nodes.text: The LC-4 was a model of speeder bike produced by Lhosan Industries during the Galactic War between the Galactic Republic and the Sith Empire.

The LC-4 was introduced in the 2015 expansion Shadow of Revan to the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, released by BioWare in 2011. It was released within the "Mid Rim Explorer's Pack" in patch 3.2.2.
